class.name: wxFileCtrl
class.description: This control allows the user to select a file.

flag.name: wxFC_OPEN
flag.description: Creates an file control suitable for opening files. Cannot be combined with wxFC_SAVE.

flag.name: wxFC_SAVE
flag.description: Creates an file control suitable for saving files. Cannot be combined with wxFC_OPEN.

flag.name: wxFC_MULTIPLE
flag.description: For open control only, Allows selecting multiple files. Cannot be combined with wxFC_SAVE

flag.name: wxFC_NOSHOWHIDDEN
flag.description: Hides the "Show Hidden Files" checkbox (Generic only)

string.name: defaultdirectory
string.label: Default directory
string.description: Sets the current directory displayed in the control.

string.name: wildcard
string.label: Wildcard
string.description: Sets the wildcard, which can contain multiple file types, for example: "BMP files (*.bmp)|*.bmp|GIF files (*.gif)|*.gif".

type.name: wxEVT_FILECTRL_FILEACTIVATED
type.description: The user activated a file(by double-clicking or pressing Enter)

type.name: wxEVT_FILECTRL_SELECTIONCHANGED
type.description: The user changed the current selection(by selecting or deselecting a file)

type.name: wxEVT_FILECTRL_FOLDERCHANGED
type.description: The current folder of the file control has been changed

type.name: wxEVT_FILECTRL_FILTERCHANGED
type.description: The current file filter of the file control has been changed. (Since: 2.9.1)
